title: Software Testing Activities
description: Focused on defect identification and product validation
items: Requirements Analysis: Reviewing specifications to identify testable requirements and gaps
Test Planning: Defining scope, objectives, resources, schedules, and risk mitigation strategies
Test Design: Creating test cases, scenarios, and data for functional/non-functional testing
Test Execution: Running tests manually or via tools, logging results, and comparing outcomes
Defect Management: Reporting bugs with steps to reproduce, severity, and tracking fixes
Specialized testing including performance, security, compatibility, and accessibility
Regression testing to ensure updates don't break existing functionality
User Acceptance Testing (UAT) Support
Test Closure: Summarizing results and documenting lessons learned

title: Quality Assurance (QA) Activities
description: Process-oriented to prevent defects and ensure standards
items: Early Involvement: Participating in requirement gathering to identify risks early
Process Design: Establishing quality standards and testing guidelines
Documentation: Maintaining test policies, strategies, and traceability matrices
Audits & Reviews: Checking adherence to processes and root-cause analysis
Continuous Improvement: Analyzing metrics and refining workflows
Team Collaboration: Bridging gaps between developers, testers, and business teams

title: Test Automation Activities
description: Enhancing efficiency through tools and scripting
items: Framework Development: Designing reusable automation architectures
Script Creation & Execution for regression, smoke, and performance tests
CI/CD Integration with tools like Jenkins
Test Data & Environment Automation
Script Maintenance and updates for new features
Tool Evaluation and selection for API, UI, or load testing
